targets.query: SELECT date_trunc('day', block_time) AS time, token_in AS metric, SUM(amount_in::numeric / 1e18) AS value FROM order_filled_events GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY 1
SELECT token_in AS token, COUNT(*) AS fills FROM order_filled_events GROUP BY token_in ORDER BY fills DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT maker, token, SUM(amount::numeric / 1e18) AS total FROM deposits GROUP BY maker, token ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 50
